##### basic requirements #####

fasteners
future
python-gettext


##### custom versions not used directly

chardet < 3.10
urllib3 < 1.26
cryptography == 3.4.8


##### backend libraries #####

azure-core
azure-storage-blob
b2sdk
boto
boto3
boxsdk[jwt]
dropbox
gdata                   ; python_version == '2.7'
gdata-python3
google-api-python-client
google-auth-oauthlib
jottalib
keyring
mediafire
megatools
paramiko
pexpect
psutil
pydrive2
pyrax
python-swiftclient
python-keystoneclient
requests
requests-oauthlib


##### testing libraries #####


2to3
coverage
mock >= 3.0.5
pycodestyle
pylint
pytest
pytest-cov
pytest-runner
setuptools >= 44.1.1
setuptools-scm >= 5.0.2
tox


##### documentation libraries #####

gitchangelog
myst-parser
pystache
sphinx
sphinx-rtd-theme
